msgSnippet: We are trying to use JUnit testing framework on our future projects designed mainly on Oracle JDeveloper. I would like to know if someone has used JUnit

We are trying to use JUnit testing framework on our future projects designed
mainly on Oracle JDeveloper. I would like to know if someone has used JUnit
testing inside JDeveloper, Oracle claim that there's support for JUnit in
JDev but a failed to see any indication of that. Any help would be
appreciated.

Thanks

Llies
